technology.description:
Check this to generate your view models on the Alfresco product line.
Alfresco is the leading open source ECM solution.
SIDE allows to optimize the configuration of the Alfresco content model, views, forms and reports.
technology.name: Alfresco

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to generate view models on the major release 3 of Alfresco.
Alfresco 3.x is the leading open source collaborative ECM solution.
Additionally to content, form and view generation, SIDE provides useful server components to enhance some features of this release.

generatorVersion.description:
Check this to generate a full deployable Alfresco package containing the newly designed views and other Alfresco artefacts.
The generated packages are standard Alfresco Module package which may be deployed in any Alfresco 3.x instance.
SIDE provides the necessary components to deploy these packages through the 'deployer' tab.
generatorVersion.version: SIDE View Generator for Alfresco Share 34d

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the URL of the Alfresco Share instance on which you want to generate and deploye the 2 new Facet navigation components (menu and results list).
configurationParameter.label: Alfresco share URL
